lead_paragraph: The state offers free tests to pregnant women, but a lack of resources has contributed to a backlog that has left hundreds waiting a long time.

headline.print_headline: Fretful Pregnancies as Zika Results Lag in Florida
headline.main: Pregnant Women Anxious as Florida’s Zika Test Results Take Weeks

snippet: The state offers free tests to pregnant women, but a lack of resources has contributed to a backlog that has left hundreds waiting a long time....
abstract: Many pregnant women in Florida are experiencing added stress of long waits and delays on results of Zika tests, which are offered for free by state; causes for delay appear primarily due to volume and there are concerns that situation will leave women with little time to consider termination of pregnancy if Zika is found; Florida bans abortions after 24 weeks.
